customer_reviews.title: and everyone I recommend it to always loves it
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this CC cream for a couple of years now, and everyone I recommend it to always loves it. I don't like heavy foundations, so this was perfect, and it also gives SPF protection. It's not too thick, so it applies thin enough to where I'm not looking like a "cake face." It's also buildable, so once it dries, you can just apply a little more in areas that need more coverage, and you're good to go.

customer_reviews.text: I honestly love this product. Yes, it's not the cheapest. But this proves you get what you pay for. It's one of the only light weight concealers that I can put on quickly after a shower and go to work. I don't have to do layers of makeup to hide any blemishes or, my worst feature... Dark spots/scaring from previous picked at pimples. Yuck. The cream leaves my face feeling fresh, not dry, not oily. It's pretty amazing and absolutely worth a try if you've never used before. I've also notices my skin seems clearer when I use this product vs. other ones. :)

customer_reviews.title: Great "foundation"; poor CC cream
customer_reviews.text: This CC cream is a dream, if only it acted like a CC cream. It has SPF 30, which is fantastic and goes on matte. With someone who has suffered her whole life from acne and skin sensitivity, this does NOT cause me to break out or become an oil slick, nor does it irritate my skin. It does a great job with coverage being that it goes on with medium coverage. However, it is a bit on the dry side and does require moisturizer applied underneath. The moisturizer has to be compatible with the formula and applied as a thin layer or else it beads up and off your face. Ew. Does not do a thing for discoloration.

With an advanced, lightweight formula, this color-correcting cream is a game changer with the proven ability to visibly lessen the appearance of dark spots, sun spots, and post-acne marks instantly and over time. It neutralizes and brightens skin for a more even complexion and primes, perfects, protects with SPF 30, adding moisture without creating excess oil.
